content:

I.ii.1.C.1.b
.
Type of Work Not Performed by the PMCs
The PMCs do not perform work which requires establishing service connection for living Veterans.  VSCs must process these claims.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
